channel.title: personal on megretson
channel.description: Recent content in personal on megretson

item.title: State Quilt
item.description: A modern interpretation of a quilt made by my Great-Grandmother, stitched with every US State flower.

item.title: 52 Pies
item.description: A project to bake a pie a week…. that’s become more like a fortnightly or monthly pie.

item.title: Quarantine Gothic
item.description: A twine game made in the early pandemic, that you can’t win and isn’t fun.
